page.title: 02Furmanite
page.content: { FURMANITE International Limited is a subsidiary of "J.Bibby and Sons,"which was acquired by Barlow Rand Limited late in 1984. The company was originally formed in 1929 to sell mechanical engineering equipment and rubber based compounds to companies to enable them to seal leaks under pressure. The change to a service company in 1967 has resulted in spectacular growth world_wide. Furmanite is a heat curing compound injected under controlled conditions to seal leaks under pressure at power stations and refineries and other process industries who cannot shut down for conventional maintenance.It consists of 500 members world wide, 150 in the UK and 80 in Kendal.It has contracts with powerstations and Esso, Shell and BP refineries.
